description.name: Assisted digital marketing tasks for both StarLegends Adventures, a travel agency, and “Ceo in Pajama”, the CEO personal brand focused on entrepreneurship and digital business.
Created and followed a content posting schedule for social media platforms to maintain consistent and timely brand visibility.
Designed marketing materials using Canva by creating promotional banners, testimonials, and event graphics.
Assisted digital marketing tasks for both StarLegends Adventures, a travel agency, and “Ceo in Pajama”, the CEO personal brand focused on entrepreneurship and digital business.
Created and followed a content posting schedule for social media platforms to maintain consistent and timely brand visibility.
Designed marketing materials using Canva by creating promotional banners, testimonials, and event graphics.
Assisted in depositing and encashing checks, ensuring accurate and timely processing of financial transactions.
Reviewed clients’ documents for errors and discrepancies, maintaining a high level of attention to detail and adherence to regulatory standards.
Calculated and compared amounts from supporting documents with disbursed amounts.
